tool_description: Compares prices of hair care products across different retailers, calculates cost per use, and identifies best value options within budget constraints.

product_names.description: Names of products to compare prices for

budget_limit.description: Maximum budget for hair care products

preferred_retailers.description: Preferred stores or websites to check

error_messages: Empty product list: Must provide at least one product name to compare
Too many products: Maximum 10 products can be compared at once
Invalid budget: Budget limit must be a positive number
Product not found: One or more products could not be found in price databases
usage: Provide product names you want to compare, your budget limit, and optionally preferred retailers to get price comparison and value analysis.

best_value_products.description: Products offering the best value for money

within_budget_options.description: Products that fit within the specified budget

cost_per_use_analysis.description: Estimated cost per application for each product

total_routine_cost.description: Total cost for complete product set
